title: Chikan no Licence
synopsis: This is the Forbidden License! The bearer of this license is able to create a field within which any manner of indecent or immoral acts seem normal. It is the ultimate permit for licentiousness. Within the confines of a train car, the girls have nowhere to run. At the moment when their resistance dies, their despair changes to pleasure... Based on a game by Black Rainbow and C:drive. (Source: AnimeNfo)
